author: kelvint
msg: First filter gets modified if operation is an AND (which is terrible if its a
cached filter and not a throw-away one).
Patch by Rick Mann (rmann at keepmedia.com).

author: kelvint
msg: Incorporates Erik's idea of displaying query inline, not as pop-up, and also the query validation feature.

author: kelvint
msg: Didn't actually log what major changes were introduced in previous version:
Distinction between term modifiers and group modifiers.
Fixed bug in trim (word boundaries don't apply to characters like + and -).
Added feature of disabling grouping via NO_MODIFIER.
